stimulusHtml: In lines 10-11 (<u>Nulla</u> . . . <u>letum</u>), we learn that Ariadne

features.html:
Directions: Read the following selection carefully for comprehension. The selection is followed by a number of related questions and incomplete statements. Select the best answer or completion.

 

Ariadne considers her options after Theseus has departed.

Nam quo me referam? Quali spe perdita nitor?

Idaeosne petam montes? At gurgite lato

discernens ponti truculentum dividit aequor.

An patris auxilium sperem? Quemne ipsa reliqui

(5) respersum iuvenem fraterna caede secuta?

Coniugis an fido consoler memet amore?

Quine fugit lentos incurvans gurgite remos?

Praeterea nullo colitur sola insula tecto,

nec patet egressus pelagi cingentibus undis.

(10) Nulla fugae ratio, nulla spes: omnia muta,

omnia sunt deserta, ostentant omnia letum.

choicesHtml: believes that her circumstances will eventually improve
wishes to find refuge in the desert
